entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:34 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -41.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 62 %

Wind: WNW 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
